title: Jaya Sri Maha Bodhi sapling for France to mark the 2600 Sambuddhathwa Jayanthi
content: Onlanka News – By Janaka Alahapperuma (Pix by: Sudath Silva) A sapling of the sacred Jaya Sri Maha Bodhi in Anuradhapura is to be planted in Paris to mark the 2600 Sambuddhathwa Jayanthi celebrations, announced the French National Buddhist Organization in France. The Bo sapling was handed over recently to the Head of the International…
